subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Ryder Hesjedal took a big step toward becoming Canada’s first winner of a Grand Tour when he cut the overall lead of Joaquim Rodriguez to 17 seconds in the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Ryder Hesjedal took a big step toward becoming Canada’s first winner of a Grand Tour when he cut the overall lead of Joaquim Rodriguez to 17 seconds in the Giro d’Italia.
